text: What do you suppose is the plumpest thing in the world? You know how sometimes you can't help but think about this topic...for three hours? Maybe it's the cheeks of an indignant child. Or is it a butt? But I think in the end...it's got to be shrimp. Can we agree that it's shrimp? Let volume 90 begin!!!

TRANSLATION NOTE:
MOVING FORWARD, "MARIJOA" OR "MARIEJOIS" WILL BE TRANSLATED AS "MARY GEOISE." THIS HAS BEEN THE CASE FOR A FEW VOLUMES NOW, BUT I JUST WANTED TO MAKE IT ABSOLUTELY CLEAR SO THERE'S NO CONFUSION. APOLOGIES FOR NOT MAKING A NOTE OF IT EARLIER.
